tests.title: Bio Test 2
tests.description: Covers fundamental to complex concepts of human digestive system including glands, enzymes, and organ functions

tests.title: Bio Test 3
tests.description: Exam-oriented questions mimicking Maharashtra Public Service Commission pattern with statement-based and application questions.

tests.title: Bio Test 4
tests.description: Supplementary set focusing on clinical conditions, anatomical details, and physiological processes of digestion.

tests.title: Bio Test 5
tests.description: Comprehensive assessment covering salivary glands to intestinal absorption with varying difficulty levels.

tests.title: Chemistry Test 3
tests.description: Assertion-Reasoning based questions testing logical understanding of chemistry concepts

tests.title: Chemistry Test 4
tests.description: Identify the incorrect statement among given options in chemistry-related questions

tests.title: Chemistry Test 5
tests.description: Matching-based questions on chemical properties, reactions, and principles

tests.title: Chemistry Test 6
tests.description: Sequencing and ordering questions related to chemical processes and reactions

tests.title: Chemistry Test 7
tests.description: Numerical and calculation-based problems in chemistry

tests.title: Chemistry Test 8
tests.description: Short passage-based questions testing comprehension and application of chemistry concepts

tests.title: Chemistry Test 9
tests.description: Questions focused on evaporation, heat transfer, and thermal properties

tests.title: Chemistry Test 10
tests.description: Fill-in-the-blank questions covering key terms and concepts in chemistry

tests.title: Chemistry Test 11
tests.description: Questions on gas laws, states of matter, and their properties
